data.text: Awurade kyi asisi nsania,
Ahantan ba a, animguase na edi so,
Teefo nokwaredi kyerɛ wɔn kwan;
Ahonya nka hwee wɔ abufuwhyew da no,
Wɔn a wonni bɔne no trenee bɔ kwan tee ma wɔn,
Pɛyɛfo treneeyɛ gye wɔn,
Sɛ omumɔyɛfo wu a, nʼanidaso yera;
Wogye ɔtreneeni fi amane mu,
Nea onsuro Onyame de nʼano sɛe ne yɔnko,
Sɛ atreneefo di yiye a, kuropɔn no di ahurusi;
Pɛyɛfo nhyira ma kuropɔn no kɔ so,
Onipa a onni adwene no bu ne yɔnko animtiaa,
Nsekudi sɛe ahotoso,
Ɔman a enni akwankyerɛ no bɔ,
Nea odi akagyinamu ma ɔfoforo no behu amane,
Ɔbea a ne yam ye no, wɔde obu ma no,
Ɔyamyefo ye ma ne ho,
Omumɔyɛfo nya akatua a ennyina,
Nea ɔyɛ nokware treneeni no nya nkwa,
Awurade kyi nnipa a wɔn koma akyea,
Gye to mu sɛ, amumɔyɛfo benya wɔn akatua,
Ɔbea hoɔfɛfo a ontumi nsi gyinae no
Atreneefo apɛde wie yiye,
Obi yɛ adɔe, na onya ne ho bebree;
Ɔyamyefo bɛkɔ so anya ne ho;
Nnipa dome nea ɔde atoko sie,
Nea ɔhwehwɛ papa akyi kwan no nya anisɔ,
Nea ɔde ne ho to nʼahonyade so no bɛhwe ase,
Nea ɔde ɔhaw bɛto nʼabusua so no bedi mframa ade,
Ɔtreneeni aba yɛ nkwadua,
Kyerɛwsɛm no ka se, “Ɛyɛ den sɛ wobegye onipa pa nkwa;
